      • execute

        public <T,B extends Query<T>> java.util.Collection<?> execute(B query)
                                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        execute a query and returns either ResultCollection with empty objects or with the number of objects retrived from the database. A prepared statement is used for this and the result set returned from the execution of the query is used.
        Parameters:
        query - Query
        Returns:
        ResultCollection
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
